Title: Two Tone Capped Sleeves Evening Dress with Applique

----

Sku: JC4295

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice:

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 6, 12, 4, 14, 10, 8

----

Colors: mint-gold, ivory-gold

----

Category: evening, formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: 

----

Description: Floor length gown with beautiful full train. This gown is two toned and shows a woman's curves with style and grace. The lace applique detail covers the bodice and extends down the sides to the floor. Dazzling beads on the applique add sparkle to this elegant gown. The cap sleeves and detailing on the sheer back finish this gown beautifully.
